thread.title: Raquel
thread.title_full: PGS Gold & Coin reviewed by Raquel

author: Raquel
title: Raquel
text: I visited PGS 2/9/17 to sell a few of my gold pieces and Teresa Gallo took care of me. She was very nice from the moment I walked in and was very helpful explaining the reason of the prices she was offering me. I was very comfortable with her knowledge and would for sure go back again. Thanks Teresa for making it easy and painless.
